mapper.select: SELECT hfo.hfo_name AS optionName, hfo.hfo_dt AS optionDate, hfo.hfo_rate AS optionRate, hfo.hfo_cycle AS optionCycle FROM house_fee_option hfo WHERE hfo.hfo_dt >= now() AND hfo.hfo_hi_seq = #{house_seq}
SELECT hfi_base_price AS basePrice, hfi_cleaning_fee AS cleaningFee, hfi_service_fee AS serviceFee FROM house_fee_info hfi WHERE hfi.hfi_hi_seq = #{house_seq}
